name: coupled
description: Full workflow for complex features - detailed planning with verification, execution, review, and testing

steps.contextHint: Create detailed implementation plan with architecture design, file structure, dependencies, and milestones
Verify IMPL_PLAN.md against requirements, check for missing details, conflicts, and quality gates
Execute implementation based on verified plan. Resume from planning session with all context preserved.
Perform multi-dimensional code review across correctness, security, performance, maintainability. Reference execution session for full code context.
Fix issues identified in review findings with prioritization by severity levels
Generate comprehensive test tasks for the implementation with coverage analysis
Execute iterative test-fix cycle until pass rate >= 95%
